name: Don't Get Caught! Big Brother is Watching You
name_original: Don't Get Caught! Big Brother is Watching You
description:
This is a prototype of game made during the 12th GameJam of Developpez.com website.

In this game, you must travel levels to find the exit before the alarm goes on. The twist is that the cameras is not focus on your character, but are security cameras. You can freely switch between active camera, and you need to figure-out how the level work
